title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Mid-Term Program for Enhancing Language Teacher Expertise with Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Analytically evaluate the educational applicability of generative AI tools
An AI-based teaching and learning design framework can be applied to develop actual classroom scenarios
An assessment rubric reflecting ethical considerations when using generative AI can be created
A writing assignment feedback system utilizing generative AI tools like ChatGPT can be established
A project design that systematically collects learner feedback on generative AI educational tools can be implemented
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
